Text:
My apologies that this took so long to post -- it's been ready for over 72 hours but, it turns out, TPB has a 3000 character limit on descriptions, tho the error message doesn't actually tell you that X(

This film has the dubious honor of supplanting Like Crazy as my least favorite encode...
